string.text: %c[d_red]You need identical oxygen tanks in order to consolidate their air supply!
%c[d_red]You need identical mask filters in order to consolidate their condition!
%c[d_cyan]Filter equipped: oxygen tanks have been taken off...
Oxygen tanks have been removed from belt.
%c[d_red]You already have an oxygen tank, or your mask has a filter equipped, or you are missing appropriate headgear!
%c[d_red]You need to wear appropriate headgear to use an oxygen tank!
%c[d_red]Your mask already has a filter equipped! Remove it first to use an oxygen tank.
%c[d_red]You already have an oxygen tank on your belt!
